description:
In this course we explain how Photoshop has improved into the rich tools that is Photoshop CC and introduces you to the latest and greatest features in this Software.

Karim Ali Adobe Certified Instructor, he has 10 years experience in teaching Graphics Programs like Photoshop , Illustrator , Indesign and Motion Graphics Programs like After Effects , Cinema 4D and he will explain this course .

Photoshop CC has amazing new features that can help you while working in Photoshop like :

  • Editable filters and effects .
  • Make perspective corrections in Camera Raw .
  • working with radial filter in Camera Raw .
  • Working with 3D imaging .
  • Improvement the image size menu .
  • Working With Shake Reduction Filter .
  • Working With new feature in Paths and Layers .

We will Give to the Students all Materials That will be effective with their like : images and PSD Files .

in this course you will spend with us 31 Minute .

Course contains a structured way in order to reach information to the trainee with easy .

This Course will teach you amazing new Features in Photoshop CC .

We Hope to enjoy with this Course ...
title: New In Photoshop CC
